actionConfiguration.body:
select ACCOUNT_ORIGIN
       ,SCHEMA_ID
       ,SCHEMA_NAME
       ,CATALOG_ID
       ,CATALOG_NAME
       ,SCHEMA_OWNER
       ,RETENTION_TIME
       ,IS_TRANSIENT
       ,IS_MANAGED_ACCESS
       ,DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_CATALOG
       ,DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_SCHEMA
       ,DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_NAME
       ,SQL_PATH
       ,COMMENT
       --,CREATED::date as created
       --,LAST_ALTERED::date as last_altered
       --,DELETED::date as deleted
       --,UNIQUE_ID
   from dev_appsmith.appsmith_tests.schemata

ORDER BY {{data_table.sortOrder.column || 'COMMENT'}} {{data_table.sortOrder.order || "ASC"}}
LIMIT {{data_table.pageSize}}
OFFSET {{(data_table.pageNo - 1) * data_table.pageSize}};
